generated_content.title: Paranormal Mysteries in Salem, Massachusetts - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the infamous sites of Salem's dark past, including the Salem Witch Trials and haunted mansions. Visit the House of the Seven Gables, a historic mansion turned museum, and experience the eerie atmosphere of the Salem Witch Museum.
